debut.context: Shown in flashback as Noland's homeland and site of his execution

keyEvents.description: Mont Blanc Noland is publicly executed for allegedly lying about the City of Gold
keyEvents.significance: The execution site where Noland becomes 'Liar Noland,' creating a legend that lasts 400 years

culture.government: Monarchy ruled by King Aruyutayan V (400 years ago)
notable_features: Published the children's book 'Liar Noland' to cover royal embarrassment
Home to the Mont Blanc family

historical_significance: The kingdom where Mont Blanc Noland was executed, creating the 'Liar Noland' legend that spread across the North Blue for 400 years. The site of one of the greatest miscarriages of justice in One Piece history.

debut.context: Shown in Noland and Kalgara flashback

keyEvents.description: Kalgara rings the Golden Bell as Noland departs, promising to ring it daily as a beacon
keyEvents.significance: The location of the promise that echoes across 400 years

keyEvents.description: Noland returns with King Aruyutayan V to find the City of Gold has vanished
keyEvents.significance: The moment that seals Noland's fate and proves the Knock Up Stream's effect

keyEvents.description: The Knock Up Stream tears the island in half, sending Shandora to the sky
keyEvents.significance: A cataclysmic event that reshapes the geography and creates Skypiea's conflict

geography.terrain: Island that was split in half by the Knock Up Stream, with the northern half sent to the sky

notable_features: Home to the City of Gold - Shandora
Location of the Golden Bell and Forest of Embodiment
Site of Noland and Kalgara's friendship

historical_significance: The original location of Shandora before the Knock Up Stream sent half the island to the sky. The site where Noland and Kalgara made their unfulfilled promise to reunite.
status: Split in half by Knock Up Stream approximately 400 years ago

keyEvents.description: The Golden Bell rings as Kalgara and the Shandians bid farewell to Noland
keyEvents.significance: The bell becomes the symbol of Noland and Kalgara's promise

keyEvents.description: Vanishes from Jaya when sent to the sky by the Knock Up Stream
keyEvents.significance: Creates the central mystery and tragedy of the arc

geography.region: Originally on Jaya in the Grand Line
geography.terrain: Ancient ruins with golden architecture including the Golden Bell

notable_features: The Golden Bell - Light of Shandora
Forest of Embodiment housing ancestor souls

historical_significance: The legendary City of Gold that Noland discovered and later vanished, leading to his execution. Sent to Skypiea by the Knock Up Stream, creating a 400-year war between Shandians and Skypieans.
status: Sent to the sky by Knock Up Stream, became part of Skypiea

debut.context: Where Kalgara rushes to say goodbye to Noland

keyEvents.description: Kalgara rushes to the shore to apologize to Noland and make his promise about the bell
keyEvents.significance: The site of their final farewell and the promise that defines the arc

historical_significance: The exact location where Kalgara and Noland said their final goodbye and made their promise to reunite.
status: Part of Jaya that remained in the Blue Sea after the Knock Up Stream

keyEvents.description: Young Wyper learns about Kalgara's promise from the village chief
keyEvents.significance: Where the inherited will of the Shandia is passed down to new generations

keyEvents.description: The village is destroyed by Enel's lightning attacks
keyEvents.significance: Enel's destruction of the Shandia homeland intensifies the urgency to defeat him

notable_features: Preserves the history of Kalgara and Noland

historical_significance: The settlement where Shandia descendants live after being displaced to Skypiea. Where Kalgara's story and promise are kept alive for 400 years.

debut.context: Village where Noland cured Tree Fever

keyEvents.description: Mousse discovers the truth about Tree Fever and tells her father Kalgara
keyEvents.significance: Where the misunderstanding between Noland and the Shandians is resolved

notable_features: Forest of Embodiment containing ancestor souls

historical_significance: The original Shandia settlement on Jaya where Noland and Kalgara's friendship was forged.
status: Sent to sky with rest of northern Jaya
